message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its value to you, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both parties. My initial offer for the product is $1200000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. To better align with my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer to move closer to a mutually beneficial agreement. My proposed price for the product is $1100000.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering the negotiations so far, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1075000.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. I am committed to finding a fair solution for both of us. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1125000 for the product.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering our previous offers, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1100000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. Based on our ongoing dialogue, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1150000 for the product.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1125000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective and am committed to finding a fair solution. Based on our discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1175000 for the product.
Considering our past negotiations, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $1150000.
